concept.title: Creating Your First Context-Sensitive Help Topic
concept.shortdesc: The previous section explains how you can create context-sensitive help topics by inserting a TopicAlias marker and specifying a topic ID as the marker text.

conbody.p: In this section, you will create your first context-sensitive help topic using the ePublisher system for DITA. This will involved entering the information listed in the task into the <prolog> section of the topic DITA file.
